snippet: GERINGER--Leonard J.,died at home on February 8, age 91, surrounded by his loving family-daughters, Kim and Wendy, sons-in-law, Colin and Bob, and grandchildren, Rachel, Alex, Adam (Erica) and Ethan. He was predeceased by his wife of 61 years, Eda. Leonard was a pioneer in the home lighting industry, a painter, sculptor, designer and collector, an avid student of American and world history and politics, and a lover of the performing and visual arts. He was a generous supporter of many progressive causes. Funeral Wednesday, February 10 at 12:30pm at Temple Kol Ami, 252 Soundview Ave., White Plains, NY. Memorial donations to Hospice and Palliative Care of Westchester, hospiceofwestchester.com 1/3
